prompt: Calculate the mean of the following data set: 5, 7, 9, 11, 13.
Find the mode of the data set: 2, 3, 3, 4, 5, 5, 5, 6.
Determine the median of the data set: 10, 4, 8, 12, 6, 9, 15.
Calculate the range of the data set: 22, 17, 19, 25, 30, 14.
A sample of 15 students has a mean exam score of 80 with a standard deviation of 6. Calculate the standard error of the mean.
Compute the variance of the data set: 3, 5, 7, 9 (assume it is a population).
A data set follows a normal distribution with a mean of 100 and a standard deviation of 15. What is the z-score for a value of 130?
A sample of 25 observations has a mean of 45 and a sample standard deviation of 10. Construct a 95% confidence interval for the population mean (use z = 1.96 for 95% confidence).
